title: Arcade Sona Poro icon
body:
I have recently been seeing people with the arcade Sona Poro icon
 in my games and I think this is thebest icon ever as I am a Sona main who uses the arcade skin and would love it if I could have an answer as how to get this icon. I would love it it if someone could give me an answer.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This icon was part of a 3 icon collection only available for a limited time last year, more details can be found at the link below.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/welcome-poro-masters-collection
